prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that resembles a haunted tree with dark wood and green leaves.
Generate a grass-type Pokemon with a spooky appearance, featuring twisted branches and eerie eyes.
Imagine a tree-like creature with a playful yet mysterious personality, ideal for a forest setting.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of nature, with a focus on ghostly aesthetics and wood textures.
Show me a mythical Pokemon that serves as a guardian of the forest, with an ancient and wise look.
Give me an eerie Pokemon that can blend into its surroundings, using its bark-like body for camouflage.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in wooded areas, showcasing a balance between beauty and a spooky vibe.
